alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:52PM CST until January 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 29 below zero. * WHERE...Chase, Hayes and Frontier Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Wednesday to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Wednesday to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
